title: How to find the voltage across each resistor when R1 is parallel to R2 ,R1 and R2 in series with R3 and R3 in parallel with R4 and R5 and R4 and R5 in series with each other - Quora

response.answer_text: It is only possible to determine by knowing the voltages and current. Use the formulas 1/R = 1/R1 + 1/ R2 …, E = I*R Or use a voltmeter and ammeter to measure those parameters.
